highlights: Utilized RabbitMQ to publish and consume incoming events to validate user's eligibility to claim promo codes and rewards.
Applied Java conventions such as DAO (Data Access Object) and MCS (Model, Controller, Service) Backend architecture.
Created unit tests and mock tests on top of validation middlewares with RabbitMQ schedulers for Backend API.
Implemented complex multi-step form and data table Frontend using React and Oyâ€™s Fortune UI.
Developed end-to-end Promo Code feature on the mobile app using Flutter and BloC state management.
Developed and automated access management backend system to multiple services using Selenium and AWS (Amplify, Lambda, Secrets Manager, S3).
Utilized Docker, AWS-CLI, and serverless CLI to create AWS Lambda layer environment before deployment.
Developed access management frontend using React, Typescript, including a personal UI-kit for Mekari.
